# [Interview #1041: Spokane Signing Report - theofficetroll, Entry #5](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1041#5)

#### Question

Is that Shard on the world of
*The Silence Divine*
?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Oh, you mean Ashyn. Ashyn is mostly barren with small fertile patches.
